charges.charge_description: 8:1326(a), (b)(1), (b)(2): ILLEGAL ALIEN FOUDN IN THE UNITED STATES FOLLOWING DEPORTATION AND CONVICTION (2)

charges.charge_disposition: CT 2: Dft comm to the cust of BOP for a term of 50 mos. Upon release frm imprisonment, th dft shall be placed on supv rel for a term of 3 yrsunder the following terms &; cond's: dft shall comply w/rules &; eg of the PO &; GO 318; dft shall comply w/rules &; reg of the INS; all fines are waived, including the costs of imprisonment &; supv, as it is found tht the dft does not hv the ability to pay. Ord tht dft pay the US a s/a of $100.00. Further, dft is advised of his right to appeal. The crt recommends a drug treatment program, &; a California Institution if possible to facilitate family visitations. (2)

charges.charge_description: 8:1326(a), (b)(1), (b)(2): ILLEGAL ALIEN FOUDN IN THE UNITED STATES FOLLOWING DEPORTATION AND CONVICTION (1)

charges.charge_disposition: On govt's motn, all remaining underlying indict, ordered dismissed (1)
